dublin_core.dcvalue: Computer aided digitalized telepathology was introduced about 10 years ago and is gaining acceptance as a mode of providing pathology to remote site The usefulness of telepathology for remote diagnosis of histology cytology and frozen section has been evaluated in USA Europe and Japan In Taiwan the use of telepathology for pathological diagnosis is still rare In order to evaluate the potential use of this technique we undertook the study using commercialized and low cost microscopy personal computer and software on routine biopsy material
Zhonghua yi xue za zhi = Chinese medical journal; Free China ed
Real-time dynamic telepathology through the Internet: evaluation of a new and economic technology at Taipei Veterans General Hospital.
